about:
I am Chirag Surendra, a Software Developer passionate about crafting efficient and scalable backend solutions. Driven by curiosity and a commitment to growth, I continuously seek opportunities to refine my technical skills and contribute to impactful projects.

During my internship at A.P. Moller Maersk, I honed my expertise in Java and Spring Boot, enhancing shipment service APIs' performance and reliability. I also gained experience in technologies like Kafka, Reactive Programming, and monitoring tools like Grafana and Prometheus.

Outside of work, I enjoy playing cricket, listening to insightful podcasts, and spending time on my family farm. Looking ahead, I aspire to deepen my knowledge in cloud computing and distributed systems, working on projects that solve complex problems and deliver value to users.
